page.title: 15EDUCATION STOKE ON TERN
page.content: {SPONSORED WALK} We hold the sponsored walk in the summer. It is a way of raising money for the school funds. All the children have a sponsor sheet for the names of the people who pledge money for every lap completed of the walk. We walk around the school field as many times as possible. We have free drinks and ice-cream afterwards. The laps are counted then we go and collect in the money owed. {SCHOOL PLAY} Each year the teachers help the children put on some entertainment for the community. It can be a play where we act a story, or it can be a musical entertainment. We try to let the whole school take part. We like to dress up in costumes.
